title: Did the Ministry of Justice say that Christian employers should be allowed to force women to wear enlightenment?
subtitle: A website on the left has taken the United States Department of Justice to the task of intervening in the Gender Discrimination case before the Supreme Court.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In a note to the United States Supreme Court in Harris Homes v. EOC, the Department of Justice argued that employers should be allowed to force employees to wear skirts, if the employer is a Christian.
